translation: From the Kanesh colony to the merchants, our messengers, karma and Wabarrat: The tablet came to the City.
On the tablet from the City now, the day anyone has heard the letter of the silver, Damiq will not raise claim against him. The Kanesh colony will receive it.

In accordance with our letter, he gave either for an investment to the palace, or for which the investment of the palace has been cleared and he has not given anything until he gave it. As long as the silver has been cleared in the tablet, let me send me word about how much silver has been cleared in the tablet and I shall send it to me.
I sent our tablets to Karma and Wabarratum.
